rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a small waiting area and built-in storage. Natural light from large glass doors.
Open-plan living room adjacent to the dining area, featuring large windows for abundant natural light and cross ventilation. Vastu guidelines ensure the east-facing window enhances energy flow.
Connected dining area with views of an adjoining garden. Designed to encourage social interactions while maintaining a sense of openness.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout, ample natural light from south-facing windows and functional ventilation.
Quiet library space positioned in a well-lit corner for optimum natural lighting. Placed according to Vastu for enhanced concentration and knowledge flow.
Dedicated study/office area with adjustable shelving, positioned near the library for synergy, ensuring access to natural light.

openings.description: Wide main entrance door providing secure and inviting access with natural lighting from above.
Large windows in the living room ensuring abundant natural light and cross ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
South-facing window in dining area to capture gentle afternoon sunlight, enhancing ambience.
West-facing windows in the kitchen ensuring balanced daylight and ventilation.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with a private balcony facing north-east for morning sunlight, and a walk-in closet. Designed with Vastu principles to promote health.
Second bedroom featuring a spacious south-facing balcony for afternoon light and cross ventilation, along with integrated storage solutions.
Third bedroom with an east-facing balcony designed to capture morning rays and ensure fresh airflow. Adheres to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
En-suite bathroom attached to the master bedroom, incorporating natural ventilation features and ample light through frosted windows.

openings.description: Spacious balcony in the master bedroom ensuring a peaceful morning view and fresh air circulation.
Balcony adjacent to bedroom 2 offering a pleasant afternoon breeze and scenic outlook.
Balcony in bedroom 3 designed for optimal morning light exposure, enhancing well-being as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.description: Expansive living area with an open layout, natural light from large panoramic windows and a balcony offering sweeping views. Vastu principles used to ensure energy flow.
Luxurious master bedroom featuring an extensive east-facing balcony that captures morning sunlight. The design adheres to Vastu for health and well-being.

openings.description: Large eastward windows in the penthouse area ensuring abundant natural light, vital for energy balance as per Vastu.
Spacious balcony providing access to panoramic views and fresh air circulation in line with natural design principles.
